name: tms-customer-in-line-address
script:
if "กรุงเทพ" in doc.state:
    city_prefix = 'แขวง'
    county_prefix = 'เขต'
    state_prefix = 'จังหวัด'
    city = str(city_prefix + doc.city + " ") if doc.city is not None else " "
    county = str(county_prefix + doc.county + " ") if doc.county is not None else " "
    state = str(state_prefix + "กรุงเทพฯ ") if doc.state is not None else " "
    pincode = doc.pincode if doc.pincode is not None else " "
    phone = doc.phone if doc.phone is not None else " "
    doc.in_line_address = doc.address_line1 + " " + city + county + state + pincode
else:
    city_prefix = 'ตำบล'
    county_prefix = 'อำเภอ'
    state_prefix = 'จังหวัด'
    city = str(city_prefix + doc.city + " ") if doc.city is not None else " "
    county = str(county_prefix + doc.county + " ") if doc.county is not None else " "
    state = str(state_prefix + doc.state + ' ') if doc.state is not None else " "
    pincode = doc.pincode if doc.pincode is not None else " "
    phone = doc.phone if doc.phone is not None else " "
    doc.in_line_address = doc.address_line1 + " " + city + county + state + pincode

name: create-sending-money
script:
sending_money_record = frappe.get_doc({
        "doctype": "Money Send Record",
        "payment_total": frappe.form_dict.get('payment_total'),
        "total_received_amount": frappe.form_dict.get('payment_total'),
        "date": frappe.form_dict.get('date'),
        "items":json.loads(frappe.form_dict.get('items')),
        
    })
sending_money_record.insert(ignore_permissions=True)
# sending_money_record.submit()

frappe.response['message'] = sending_money_record.name

name: money-send-before-save
money-send-after-submit
script:
total_received_amount = 0
for item in doc.items:
    if item.delivery_order is not None:
        grand_total = frappe.db.get_value('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order, 'grand_total')
        comission = frappe.db.get_value('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order, 'commission')
        money_received_amount = frappe.db.get_value('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order, 'money_received_amount')
        new_total = money_received_amount + item.received_amount
        total_received_amount = total_received_amount + item.received_amount
        # note = frappe.get_doc('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order)
        # note.received_amount = item.received_amount
        # note.save(ignore_permissions=True)
        frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order, 'money_received_amount', new_total)
        if(new_total == (grand_total - comission)):
            frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order, 'sending_money_status', 'Close')
        else:
            frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order, 'sending_money_status', 'Open')
        # frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order, 'remaining_amount', float(grand_total) - float(item.recieved_amount))
frappe.db.set_value('Money Send Record', doc.name, 'total_received_amount', total_received_amount, update_modified=False)
frappe.db.set_value('Money Send Record', doc.name, 'payment_total', doc.total_received_amount)
frappe.db.set_value('Money Send Record', doc.name, 'status', 'To Bill')

name: money-send-after-cancel
script:
for item in doc.items:
    if item.delivery_order is not None:
        commission = frappe.db.get_value('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order, 'commission')
        grand_total = frappe.db.get_value('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order, 'grand_total')
        money_received_amount = frappe.db.get_value('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order, 'money_received_amount')
        new_total = money_received_amount - item.received_amount
        # note = frappe.get_doc('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order)
        # note.received_amount = item.received_amount
        # note.save(ignore_permissions=True)
        frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order, 'money_received_amount', new_total)
        if(new_total == (grand_total - commission)):
            frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order, 'sending_money_status', 'Close')
        else:
            frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order, 'sending_money_status', 'Open')
        
frappe.db.set_value('Money Send Record', doc.name, 'status', 'Cancelled')

name: edit-delivery-order-items
script:
note = frappe.get_doc('Delivery Order', frappe.form_dict.get('delivery_order'))
doc = frappe.get_doc('Delivery Order', frappe.form_dict.get('delivery_order'))
items = json.loads(frappe.form_dict.get('items'))

response = 'ok'

for item in items:
    frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order Item', item.get('name'), {
        "item_code": item.get('item_code'),
        "item_name": item.get('item_name'),
        "qty": item.get('qty'),
        "uom": item.get('uom'),
        "rate": item.get('rate'),
        "amount": float(item.get('qty')) * float(item.get('rate')),
    })

total_sum = sum(float(item.get('amount')) for item in items)
frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order', note.get('name'), {
        "total_qty": sum(float(item.get('qty')) for item in items),
        "grand_total": total_sum,
        "sending_money_status": 'Close' if float(total_sum) == float(doc.money_received_amount) else 'Open'
    })
frappe.db.commit()

# save rate
for child in items:
    filter_options = {
	            "sender_id": doc.sender_id,
	            "recipient_id": doc.recipient_id,
	            "cash_on": doc.cash_on,
	            "item": child.get('item_code'),
	            "uom": child.get('uom'),
	}
    if float(child.get('rate')) != 0:
        new_doc = frappe.get_doc({
                'doctype': 'TMS Price List',
	            'sender_id': doc.sender_id,
	            'recipient_id': doc.recipient_id,
	            'cash_on': doc.cash_on,
	            'item': child.get('item_code'),
	            'uom': child.get('uom'),
	            'rate': child.get('rate')
	        })
        if(frappe.db.exists("TMS Price List", filter_options) is None):
            if(child.get('item_code') is not None):
                new_doc.insert()
                response = "Rate Save !"
        else:
            exist = frappe.db.get_all('TMS Price List', filters=filter_options,as_list=True)
            frappe.db.set_value('TMS Price List', exist[0].get('name'), 'rate', child.get('rate'))
            response = frappe.db.exists("TMS Price List", filter_options)
    frappe.db.commit()

frappe.response['message'] = response

delivery-order-after-save
script:
if doc.money_received_amount == doc.grand_total - doc.commission:
    # doc.sending_money_status = 'Close'
    frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order', doc.name,
                        {'sending_money_status': 'Close'}, update_modified=False
                        )
else:
    # doc.sending_money_status = 'Open'
    frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order', doc.name,
                        {'sending_money_status': 'Open'}, update_modified=False
                        )

# Money Send Record

mn_sends = frappe.db.get_all('Money Send Record Item',
                              filters={'delivery_order': doc.name},
                              fields=['name'])

for record_name in mn_sends:
    frappe.db.set_value('Money Send Record Item', record_name,
                        {'recipient_name': doc.recipient})

# Delivery Order Transfer

do_transfers = frappe.db.get_all('Delivery Order Transfer Item',
                                  filters={'delivery_order': doc.name},
                                  fields=['name', 'posting_date','source_warehouse','sender','recipient','recipient_in_line_address','hand_bill_no','recipient_county','recipient_province','grand_total','grand_total_qty','grand_total_weight','grand_total_volume','cash_on'])

for record_name in do_transfers:
    frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order Transfer Item', record_name, {
        'posting_date': doc.posting_date,
        'source_warehouse': doc.source_warehouse,
        'sender': doc.sender_id,
        'recipient': doc.recipient_id,
        'recipient_in_line_address': doc.recipient_in_line_address,
        'hand_bill_no': doc.hand_bill_no,
        'recipient_county': doc.recipient_county,
        'recipient_province': doc.recipient_province,
        'grand_total': doc.grand_total,
        'grand_total_qty': doc.grand_total_qty,
        'grand_total_weight': doc.grand_total_weight,
        'grand_total_volume': doc.grand_total_volume,
        'cash_on': doc.cash_on,
        })

# Delivery Order Trip

do_trips = frappe.db.get_all('Delivery Order Trip Item',
                              filters={'delivery_order': doc.name},
                              fields=['name', 'posting_date','source_warehouse','sender','recipient','recipient_in_line_address','hand_bill_no','recipient_county','recipient_province','grand_total','grand_total_qty','grand_total_weight','grand_total_volume','cash_on'])

for record_name in do_trips:
    frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order Trip Item', record_name, {
        'posting_date': doc.posting_date,
        'source_warehouse': doc.source_warehouse,
        'sender': doc.sender_id,
        'recipient': doc.recipient_id,
        'recipient_in_line_address': doc.recipient_in_line_address,
        'hand_bill_no': doc.hand_bill_no,
        'recipient_county': doc.recipient_county,
        'recipient_province': doc.recipient_province,
        'grand_total': doc.grand_total,
        'grand_total_qty': doc.grand_total_qty,
        'grand_total_weight': doc.grand_total_weight,
        'grand_total_volume': doc.grand_total_volume,
        'cash_on': doc.cash_on,
        })

# Item Price List

for child in doc.items:
    filter_options = {
        'sender_id': doc.sender_id,
        'recipient_id': doc.recipient_id,
        'cash_on': doc.cash_on,
        'item': child.get('item_code'),
        'uom': child.get('uom'),
        }
    if float(child.get('rate')) != 0:
        new_doc = frappe.get_doc({
            'doctype': 'TMS Price List',
            'sender_id': doc.sender_id,
            'recipient_id': doc.recipient_id,
            'cash_on': doc.cash_on,
            'item': child.get('item_code'),
            'uom': child.get('uom'),
            'rate': child.get('rate'),
            })
        list = frappe.db.get_list('TMS Price List', pluck='name',
                                  filters=filter_options)
        if len(list) <= 0:
            if(child.get('item_code') is not None):
                new_doc.insert()
        else:
            frappe.db.set_value('TMS Price List', list[0], 'rate',
                                child.get('rate'), update_modified=False)

name: delivery-order-after-submit
script:
frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order', doc.name, 'money_received_amount', 0)
frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order', doc.name, 'status', 'Submitted')

grand_total = 0
grand_qty = 0
for item in doc.items:
    grand_total = grand_total + item.amount
    grand_qty = grand_qty + item.qty
    
frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order', doc.name,
                        {
                            'grand_total': grand_total,
                            'grand_total_qty': grand_qty
                        }, update_modified=False
                        )

name: sales-invoice-before-validate
script:
company = frappe.get_doc('Company', doc.company)

if 'Money Send Record' in doc.tms_reference_type:
    if len(doc.items) > 0:
        for item in doc.items:
            item.delete()
    doc.items = []
    income_item = frappe.get_doc('Item', company.tms_income_item) 
    money_send_record = frappe.get_doc('Money Send Record', doc.money_send_record) 
    doc.append("items", {
        'item_code': income_item.name,
        'item_name': income_item.item_name,
        'rate': money_send_record.payment_total,
        'base_rate': money_send_record.payment_total,
        'qty': 1,
        'ps': '-',
        'uom': income_item.stock_uom,
        
    })

delete-delivery-order-transfer-child
script:
items = json.loads(frappe.form_dict.get('items'))

response = 'ok'

for item in items:
    child = frappe.get_doc('Delivery Order Transfer Item', item)
    frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order', child.delivery_order, {
        'tr_no': None,
        'transfer_driver': None,
        'transfer_driver_name': None,
        'transfer_vehicle_no': None,
        'transfer_date_time': None
    })
    child.delete(ignore_permissions=True)

frappe.response['message'] = response

name: delete-delivery-order-trip-child
script:
items = json.loads(frappe.form_dict.get('items'))

response = 'ok'

for item in items:
    child = frappe.get_doc('Delivery Order Trip Item', item)
    frappe.db.set_value('Delivery Order', child.delivery_order, {
        'dr_no': None,
        'dispatch_driver': None,
        'dispatch_driver_name': None,
        'dispatch_vehicle_no': None,
        'dispatch_date_time': None
    })
    child.cancel()
    child.delete()

frappe.response['message'] = response
